properties.entry: UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#incrementPageCount() */ TBL_PAGE_COUNT A SET A.PAGE_VIEW = (SELECT B.PAGE_VIEW FROM TBL_PAGE_COUNT B WHERE B.PAGE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.PAGE_NO = ?
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#selectPageViewCount() */ A.PAGE_NO , A.PAGE_VIEW , A.PAGE_NAME FROM TBL_PAGE_COUNT A
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#deleteMember() */ TBL_USER A SET USER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#restoreMember() */ TBL_USER A SET USER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#selectAllMemberList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.EMAIL LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.PHONE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ROLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.APPLY_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.APPROVAL_YN LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.ENROLL_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_STATUS LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.EMAIL LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.PHONE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.USER_ROLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.APPLY_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.APPROVAL_YN LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.ENROLL_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.admin.model.dao.AdminDAO#searchUserManageList() */ A.RNUM , A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_ROLE , A.APPLY_DATE , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.USER_NO , B.USER_ID , B.NICKNAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_ROLE , B.APPLY_DATE , B.APPROVAL_YN , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.USER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.NICKNAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE , C.USER_ROLE , C.APPLY_DATE , C.APPROVAL_YN , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.USER_STATUS LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
